org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins

Class SelectionTrack

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins.SelectionTrack

  • final class SelectionTrack
extends Object
    It maintains the start and end point of mouse selection at X level.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double end 
      private double endValue 
      private double start 
      private double starting 
      private double startValue 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SelectionTrack(double starting)
      Creates the object storing the original X point of mouse down.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) double getEnd()
      Returns the ending point
      (package private) double getEndValue()
      Returns the ending value on scale
      (package private) double getStart()
      Returns the new starting point (new mouse down)
      (package private) double getStarting()
      Returns the starting point
      (package private) double getStartValue()
      Returns the start value on scale
      (package private) boolean isValid()
      Returns true if start and end positions are consistent and that means an area has been selected.
      (package private) void setCurrent(double position)
      Changes the start and end depending of new X point position of mouse.
      (package private) void setEndValue(double endValue)
      Sets the end value retrieved from scale
      (package private) void setStartValue(double startValue)
      Sets the start value retrieved from scale
